title: David Gilmour - In Concert (resequenced by }{eywood)
description:
David Gilmour
In Concert
resequenced by }{eywood

This is a stereo rip from the DVD.  I took a lot of the bonus material and sequenced it back into the setlist so it all sounds like one concert.  I also switched the two versions of Comfortably Numb around because Robert Wyatt's version totall blows and ruins the concert.  It is now a bonus track while the superior Geldof version is in the main set.

01 Shine On You Crazy Diamond
02 Terrapin
03 Dominoes
04 Fat Old Sun
05 Coming Back to Life
06 High Hopes
07 High Hopes a capella
08 Je Crois Entendre Encore
09 Smile
10 Wish You Were Here
11 Comfortablt Numb (w/ Bob Geldof)
12 The Dimming of the Day
13 Breakthrough
14 Shine On You Crazy Diamond Parts 6-8
15 A Great Day for Freedom
16 Hushabye Mountain

17 Don't
18 Sonnet 18
19 Comfortably Numb (w/ Robert Wyatt)
20 DVD menu soundscape
